content: stitch row 3 sl 1 purl to 1 st before the gap p2tog across the gap p1 close the toe of your sock weave in the ends rock your new turn work socks row 4 sl 1 knit to 1 st before the gap ssk across the gap k1 turn work repeat row 3 & 4 until all the heel sts have been worked ending with row 4 16 18 20 sts rem on back needle pick up stitches using the back needle pick up and knit 14 16 18 sts along the heel flap edge pick up and knit one additional st to close the gap place a marker knit the first 14 16 18 sts of the front needle this is now needle 1 using the front needle knit the next 14 16 18 sts place a marker pick up and knit one additional st to close the gap then pick up and knit 14 16 18 sts along the heel flap edge knit 8 9 10 heel stitches this is now needle 2 there are now 37 42 47 sts on each needle page 2 of 2 @notsorryknitter on ravelry instagram ello & twitter | unapologeticknitter com | the unapologetic knitter on facebook & youtube
